FaizPointer.NAME: SB-555L
DESCRIPTION: #y Passive:  NL At the start of the round, gain 1 BriefStrength and BriefDexterity NL
#y Active:  NL Add 1 Crimson Smash to hand (3 Photon Stream to recharge)

FaizPhone.NAME: SB-555P
DESCRIPTION: #y Passive:  NL At the end of the round, deal 3 innate damage 3 times to a random enemy NL
#y Active:  NL Deal 5 innate damage 3 times to a random enemy (1 Photon Stream to recharge)
